content: शीत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [श्यै-क्त] {@--1@} Cool, cold, frigid; तव कुसुमशरत्वं शीतरश्मित्वमिंदोः <ls>Ś. 3. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Dull, sluggish, apathetic, sleepy. {@--3@} Dull, lazy, stupid. --तः {@--1@} A kind of reed. {@--2@} The Nimba tree. {@--3@} The cold season ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} also). {@--4@} Camphor. --तं {@--1@} Cold, coldness chillness; आः शीतं तुहिनाचलस्य करयोः <ls>K. P. 10.</ls> {@--2@} Water. {@--3@} Cinnamon.
